import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import Checkoutsteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalcode, setPostalcode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalcode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address, city, postalcode, country})) history.push('/payments') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)}> City setCity(e.target.value)}> Postal code setPostalcode(e.target.value)}> Country setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default ShippingScreen
